dict.acceptation: （坚定地向某地）前进；行军，进军；游行示威；进展，进行；
行进，前进；行军；游行示威；进行曲；

sent.orig: January, March, May, and June were all named after Roman gods.
sent.trans: JANUARY（一月）、march（二月）、MAY（五月）和JUNE（六月）都是用罗马神的名字来命名的。

sent.orig: This series takes place the month of March and is known as "March Madness. "
sent.trans: 这一系列比赛在3月举行，被称作“疯狂三月”。

sent.orig: For five nights from March 4th until march 9th.
I have a March deadline for the novel, ie It must be finished by March.
sent.trans: 我那本小说必须在叁月完成。
